outputs.name: Begin
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the hand gesture moves from "undetected" state to "detected" state

outputs.name: Stay
outputs.description: Keep executing the next node when the hand gesture stays detected

outputs.name: End
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the hand gesture moves from "detected" state to "undetected" state

outputs.name: None
outputs.description: Keep executing the next node when the hand gesture is not detected
